name: Southern Charm Wine Glass with Charms 4-Pack
description:
This set of four handmade southern wine glasses is the perfect stemware for entertaining family, friends and special guests with high-faluting standards. Each of our glasses is hand made using genuine pint-sized Ball mason jars. And each glass comes with an inset glass wine charm in a unique color (up to 12 different colors) to make it easier to tell guests' drinks apart.

Please note that each glass is hand made with a custom fusion process. As with any handmade item, they should be used with care. Glasses should be hand washed with warm water.

name: Southern Charm Wine Glass 4-Pack SALE!
description: This set of four handmade southern wine glasses is the perfect stemware for entertaining family, friends and special guests with high-faluting standards. Each of our glasses is hand made using genuine pint-sized Ball mason jars. name: Southern Charm Champagne Toasting Glass 2-Pack
description:
This pair of handmade southern champagne glasses is the perfect stemware for toasting at fancy society events with high-faluting friends and family. Each of our glasses is hand made using genuine quilted Ball mason jars. The airtight lids are perfect for keeping your drink from spilling or for keeping the bugs out of your drink while eating outdoors.

Please note that each glass is hand made with a custom fusion process. As with any handmade item, they should be used with care. Glasses should be hand washed with warm water.
